      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.add(z_Colors c)
      Adds a copy of the given color to the list
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.addAll(Collection<z_Colors> collection)
      Adds all entries of the Colors collection to the list (shallow copy only, manipulating the new list will modify the original colors).
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.adjustBrightness(float step)
      Adjusts the brightness component of all list colors by the given amount.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.adjustSaturation(float step)
      Adjusts the saturation component of all list colors by the given amount.

      Calculates the gradient from specified position.

      Sorts the list based on two criteria to create clusters/segments within the list.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.complement()
      Switches all list colors to their complementary color.

      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.getBlended(float amount)
      Creates a new ColorList by blending all colors in the list with each other (successive indices only)
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorTheme.getColors(int num)
      Creates a vc_ColorList of z_Colorss based on the theme's ranges and balance defined by their weights
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorRange.getColors(int num)
      Creates a new vc_ColorList of colors based on the constraints of this range.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorRange.getColors(z_Colors c, int num, float variance)
      Creates a new vc_ColorList of shades of the given z_Colors based on the other constraints of the range.

      Returns a reversed copy of the current list.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.invert()
      Inverts all colors in the list.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.reverse()
      Reverses the current order of the list.

      Rotates the hues of all colors in the list by the given amount.

      Rotates the hues of all colors in the list by the given amount.

      Sorts the list using the given vc_a_CriteriaAccess.
      vc_ColorList vc_ColorList.sortByDistance(boolean isReversed)
      Sorts the list by relative distance to each predecessor, starting with the darkest color in the list.

      Sorts the list by relative distance to each predecessor, starting with the darkest color in the list.

      Sorts the list by proximity to the given target color (using RGB distance metrics).

      Sorts the list by proximity to the given target color using the given vc_i_Distance implementation.
